text: Dennis Young (1 April 1930 â€“ 21 June 2020) was a New Zealand rugby union player. Young represented Canterbury at a provincial level. He was a member of the New Zealand national side, the All Blacks, from 1956 to 1964. He played 61 matches for the All Blacks including 22 internationals. He was born in Christchurch. Young died in Christchurch on 21 June 2020 from cancer, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in New Zealand Category:Sportspeople from Christchurch Category:New Zealand rugby union players
title: Dennis Young (rugby player)
